tha-ap143:3.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
tha-ap143:3.3_0: I don’t get lots of humans—
tha-ap143:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap143:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap143:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap143:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nārada.
tha-ap143:6.1_0: he is the first among the senior monks.
